name: TrendNationNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to true news with the TrendFlash by TrendNation.
Just ask "Alexa, what's my news briefing?" and Alexa will begin reading your skills of choice, including the TrendFlash.

You'll be able to catch up on the latest news in a variety of categories. Including...
• Sports
• Politics
• Technology
• Business
• Cooking
and more.

For help, visit the Renervate website, and select Renervate Help in the products section.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
